summary: This is an FBI record of incoming correspondence from Ed Pointanos of Rockville, MD to FBI Director Christopher A. Wray regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein. The document is a synopsis of citizen mail received by the FBI Director's office.

persons.name: Christopher A. Wray
persons.context: Recipient of correspondence from a citizen regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Ed Pointanos
persons.context: Author of correspondence to FBI Director Wray from Rockville, MD regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the correspondence regarding his death.

connections.description: Pointanos sent correspondence to FBI Director Wray regarding Epstein's death.
Pointanos wrote to the FBI Director about Epstein's death, indicating interest or concern about the case.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Referenced as the subject of citizen correspondence to the FBI Director.

events.title: Correspondence received by FBI
events.description: Citizen mail from Ed Pointanos regarding Epstein's death was received by FBI Director Wray's office.

keyFacts: Citizen correspondence regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death was sent to FBI Director Christopher Wray in August 2021.
The correspondence came from Ed Pointanos of Rockville, Maryland.
This document shows continued public interest and correspondence to the FBI about Epstein's death years after it occurred.
The FBI maintained records of citizen mail sent to the Director regarding the Epstein case.
